sentences.sentence: The proscription of the intention in offence of intention is blurring, so we should restrict its scope of application.
sentences.translation: 目的犯中目的规定的模糊性使得其具有一些固有的弱点，所以，应当限制其应用范围。

sentences.sentence: Such considerations motivated the SETI group at the International Academy of Astronautics to reject a proscription of transmissions to the sky.
sentences.translation: 这些考虑激发了国际宇航科学研究院SETI小组的积极性去拒绝取缔向天空传送信号。

sentences.sentence: Case examination also provided an opportunity to reintroduce values into the curriculum, despite their proscription in the ranks of behaviorally oriented texts.
sentences.translation: 案例考试同样给对课程中重新介绍一些价值提供了机会，尽管在很多行为主义导向的课本中仍然处于被忽视的境地。
